body: According to docs it should work...

Yes, but when i try it, i have
![s2](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/25243076/24439581/c7015600-1457-11e7-848b-d72a78457314.PNG)
I think my PR will fix this as well: https://github.com/yiisoft/yii2/pull/13891
